```{r}
#Loading rvest package
pacman::p_load(rvest, XML, xml2, tidyverse)

#Specify 'the Guardian's url
TG <- read_html("https://www.theguardian.com/politics")

#Doesn't work - (looking for the links)
TG %>% 
  html_nodes("p.u-faux-block-link__overlay js-headline-text") %>% 
  html_text()




#Specify 'metro's url
M <- read_html("https://metro.co.uk/news/")

Mt <- M %>%  html_node("title") %>% 
  html_text()

Munder <- M %>% html_nodes("h3") %>% 
  html_text()
```
